application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: RESUB- Detail of Condition 3-Tree survey - proposed works/protection as required by full planning permission ref 19/AP/1173 dated 21/03/2022 for minor material amendment to planning permission 19/AP/1173 (Construction of a seven storey extension to the rear (from ground to sixth floor- the ground floor being an under croft) and two additional storeys with terraces to the existing five storey building for the retention of A1 (retail) on the ground floor and increased B1 (office) floorspace on the upper floors to create a seven storey building across the footprint of thewhole site.) Changes include:- Construction of a single storey extension at ground floor level to the rear;- New wall at ground floor level to the west and north elevation;- Raised cil level at 6th floor;- Fenestration changes, including additional windows to the east elevation at ground floor level;- Changes to the tower design, removal of glazed corner cube;- Revised plant configuration at roof level;- New staircore, lift overrun and smoke extract at roof level;- Areas at roof reserved for photovoltaics and green roof;- Creation of a new basement level to accommodate a new sprinkler tank/plant.Condition 3 Arboriculture 22/AP/1008 Oliver Stutter The condition is being re-submitted purely so that it can be discharged under the new S73 reference 21/AP/0960
site_name: 150-154 Borough High StreetLondonSouthwarkSE1
